statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type='Achievement' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type='Quest' ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM in_game_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_date FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type='Bonus' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type='Event' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM in_game_events WHERE event_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND event_type = 'quest' ORDER BY event_id ASC
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM in_game_events WHERE event_type IN ('battle', 'puzzle') ORDER BY event_name ASC, event_description DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM in_game_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_type FROM in_game_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%bonus%' OR event_description LIKE '%gift%' ORDER BY event_type
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM Events WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM Quests WHERE quest_difficulty = 3;
SELECT * FROM Quests WHERE quest_name LIKE '%treasure%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM Quests WHERE quest_difficulty > 3 ORDER BY quest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_description LIKE '%exciting%';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events JOIN Quests ON Events.event_id = Quests.quest_id WHERE quest_difficulty < 5 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, quest_difficulty FROM Quests WHERE quest_name LIKE '%climb%' ORDER BY quest_difficulty DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, quest_difficulty FROM Quests
SELECT player_id, quest_id, progress_status FROM Progress
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM Events
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, quest_difficulty FROM Quests
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Quests WHERE quest_difficulty > 3 ORDER BY quest_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_name LIKE '%workshop%' AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT player_id, progress_status, progress_date FROM Progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed' AND progress_date >= '2022-05-01' ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Events JOIN Progress ON Events.event_id = Progress.quest_id WHERE Events.event_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY Events.event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT quest_id, quest_name FROM quests WHERE quest_difficulty > 3 ORDER BY quest_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_experience > 1000;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_difficulty > 3 ORDER BY quest_reward DESC;

SELECT players.player_name, player_progress.progress_status, quests.quest_name FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN quests ON player_progress.quest_id = quests.quest_id ORDER BY players.player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM Events;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM Quests WHERE quest_difficulty='Easy';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM Players WHERE player_join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, quest_difficulty FROM Quests WHERE quest_difficulty = 'Hard' ORDER BY quest_start_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, event_name, registration_date FROM Players JOIN EventRegistrations ON Players.player_id = EventRegistrations.player_id JOIN Events ON EventRegistrations.event_id = Events.event_id;
